mainBoard.flavorText: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."

foreignData.flavorText: „Selbst das potenteste Gift wird mit Pharikas Segen zu einem Allheilmittel. Ich bringe es jenen, die würdig sind und an der Schwelle zum Abgrund stehen."
foreignData.name: Heilerin der Pharika
foreignData.text: Wenn die Heilerin der Pharika ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreaturen- oder Verzauberungskarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückbringen.

foreignData.flavorText: "El veneno más nefasto se convierte en una panacea bajo la tutela de Farika. Se la llevo a quienes la merecen, aferrados al borde del abismo".

foreignData.flavorText: « Par la grâce de Pharika, le poison le plus violent devient panacée. Je l'apporte à ceux qui le méritent, agrippés au bord de l'abysse. »

foreignData.flavorText: "Il veleno più terribile diventa una panacea grazie alla guida di Farika. Io la porto a chi è degno, mentre si aggrappa all'orlo dell'abisso."

foreignData.name: 파리카의 치유사

mainBoard.name: Nemesis of Mortals
mainBoard.originalText:
Nemesis of Mortals costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
{7}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 5. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature card in your graveyard. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put five +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when a creature becomes monstrous won't trigger if that creature isn't on the battlefield when its monstrosity ability resolves.
Monstrous isn't an ability that a creature has. It's just something true about that creature. If the creature stops being a creature or loses its abilities, it will continue to be monstrous.
Neither the cost-reducing ability of Nemesis of Mortals nor the condition of its monstrosity ability can reduce the colored mana requirement of those costs.
Once a creature becomes monstrous, it can't become monstrous again. If the creature is already monstrous when the monstrosity ability resolves, nothing happens.
Once you declare you're casting Nemesis of Mortals or activating its ability, it's too late for players to try to change the number of creature cards in your graveyard to affect the cost of doing so.

mainBoard.flavorText: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.

foreignData.flavorText: Vertrieben von seinen lebenden Artgenossen irrt er trauernd durch die Wildnis, immer auf der Suche nach Asphodel, der Polis der Toten.
foreignData.name: Wiedergekehrter Zentaur
foreignData.text: Wenn der Wiedergekehrte Zentaur ins Spiel kommt, legt ein Spieler deiner Wahl die obersten vier Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: Expulsado por sus hermanos vivos, vaga y se lamenta por los parajes en busca de la ciudad muerta de Asfodel.

foreignData.text: Cuando el Centauro resurgido entre al campo de batalla, el jugador objetivo pone las cuatro primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: Chassé par ses semblables du monde des vivants, il parcourt désespérément les terres sauvages en quête de la cité des morts d'Asphodèle.

foreignData.flavorText: Scacciato dai suoi fratelli viventi, vaga gemendo per le terre selvagge, alla ricerca della città morta di Asfodelo.
